title: Fmr. Boston Fed President: Powell Isn’t a Lame Duck
description: Eric Rosengren, former Boston Fed President, says Chair Powell is not a lame duck and will continue setting policy as he sees fit. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close" that Powell wants to hand off a stable economy, but the next Fed chair will face a more difficult committee. (Source: Bloomberg)
